description: Holds the Event Value Flags for Events Database (IEV) Events.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the event record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this event.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple flags associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EVENT_FLAGS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The flags for a value that was added as an ED course comment, such as "abnormal" or "critical" for a lab result value.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


(none)


Abnormal Value


Critical Value


Significant


Discrepant


Abnormally Low Value


Abnormally High Value


Critically Low Value


Critically High Val


Abnormal Order
